sourceDetails.name: Pull in data from a Webhook

typeSettings.name: Webhook
typeSettings.urlSlugText: Pull in data from a Webhook

inputsBinding.name: prompt
inputsBinding.formulaText:
"From this LinkedIn profile: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Prospect Li URL}}) + "

Find:
1) Full name
2) Current job title
3) Location
4) A 1-sentence summary of their professional background"

inputsBinding.name: prompt
inputsBinding.formulaText:
"Research the company " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Enrich Company}}?.name) + " (" + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Company Domain}}) + ")

Find:
1) What the company does (1-2 sentences)
2) Their primary industry vertical
3) Whether they appear to be hiring (check their careers page)
4) Any recent news or funding announcements from the last 6 months"

inputsBinding.name: prompt
inputsBinding.formulaText:
"Score this prospect for B2B SaaS outreach relevance.

**Prospect:**
Name: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Prospect Profile}}?.fullName) + "
Title: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Prospect Profile}}?.currentJobTitle) + "
Location: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Prospect Profile}}?.location) + "
Background: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Prospect Profile}}?.backgroundSummary) + "

**Company:**
Name: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Enrich Company}}?.name) + "
Employees: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Employee Count}}) + "
Industry: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Company Research}}?.industryVertical) + "
Description: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Company Research}}?.companyDescription) + "
Hiring: " + Clay.formatForAIPrompt({{@Company Research}}?.isHiring) + "

Scoring rules:
- Tier 1: Decision maker (VP+, C-level, Founder) at a company with 50-500 employees in the US
- Tier 2: Manager-level or relevant department head at qualifying company
- DQ: Outside US, company too small (<20) or too large (>1000), irrelevant role"
